DOC.brief_summary: This study compared revisional malabsorptive laparoscopic very very long limb gastric bypass (VVLL RYGB) with primary VVLL RYGB and tested the hypothesis that one staged revisional laparoscopic VVLL RYGB is a safe and effective procedure after failed restrictive gastric banding.
DOC.brief_title: Revisional Versus Primary Roux-en-Y Gastric Bypass: a Case Matched Analysis
DOC.criteria: Primary Gastric Bypass according to SMOB (Swiss group for the study of morbid obesity) Guidelines Revisional Gastric Bypass after failed Gastric Banding According to SMOB Criteria
